SELECT D.DATE_INFO AS LOG_DATE, T.TYPE, NVL(SUM(L.COUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_INFO, YEAR, MONTH, DAY FROM DATE_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND YEAR = #{year}
AND MONTH = LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0')
AND DAY = #{day}
) D CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 'animal' AS TYPE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'plant' AS TYPE FROM DUAL ) T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ANIMAL_VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS log_date, 'animal' AS type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ANIMAL_HOSPITAL_TREATMENT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TO_CHAR(ANIMAL_VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year}
AND TO_CHAR(ANIMAL_VISIT_DATE, 'MM') = LPAD(#{month}, 2, '0')
AND TO_CHAR(ANIMAL_VISIT_DATE, 'DD') = LPAD(#{day}, 2, '0')
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ANIMAL_VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
UNION ALL
